document_data.mainbody: he Rules Expansion Gift Set is a boxed set containing three sourcebooks and one Dungeon Masters screen for 5-edition Dungeons & Dragons. Two of the sourcebooks are updated versions of older rule sourcebooks, namely Tashas Cauldron of Everything and Xanathars Guide to Everything. The third, Mordenkainen Presents Monsters of the Multiverse, collects and revises hundreds of monster stat blocks and thirty player race options from several previously published sources.
